xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/320197-Broadway Theatre Archive: Guests of the Nation 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null Directed by John Desmond, this politically charged drama centers on the complex relationship between a pair of British soldiers and the two Irish Republican Army insurgents guarding them in a remote farmhouse owned by a spirited widow. Frank Converse and Estelle Parsons turn in outstanding performances in this engrossing small-screen adaptation of Frank O'Connor's acclaimed short story set in 1921. Broadway Theatre Archive: Guests of the Nation
